item.description:
Agenda

Introduction
+ Greetings
+ Questions
+ Basic Setting/Characters
Main Themes
+ Four Arguments of the Soul
+ Theory of Forms
+ Basic discussion on the Book
Conclusion
+ Comments on the texts as a whole

Note: I will bring the old outline on the Pre-Socratic and this book.

Hey remember to atleast buy a drink. The Redline offers a full menu and I almost always get food. New members we "meetup" in the backroom cut off from the main section by a curtain.
item.name: Phaedo by Plato (Boston Philosophy Meetup)
